alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 26 at 4:58PM MDT until July 26 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Tornado Warning for... South central Kit Carson County in east central Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 458 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles south of Vona, or 10 miles southeast of Seibert, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Kit Carson County. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
